mapper.insert: insert into reply (bno, replytext, replyer) values (#{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: select rno, bno, replytext, replyer, name, r.regdate, r.updatedate ,(select writer from board where bno = r.bno) writer from reply r, member m where r.replyer= m.userid and bno=#{bno} order by rno desc
select count(*) from reply where bno=#{bno}
